attributes.action: Bring the V Machine back to Priory School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 10th November the V Machine (a vending machine containing healthy food and drink) was removed from the Priory School, Shrewsbury. We hope that you can bring the legend back. We are replacing with the caffiene contained coffee machine (an addictive drug that should not be anywhere near schools such as the Priory).

rejection.details: This is an issue for the Priory rather than Central Government.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
